description:
Raspberry Pi OS 2024-03-12 is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.6 LTS and offering improved support for Raspberry Pi 5.

The post Raspberry Pi OS Is Now Powered by Linux 6.6 LTS, Improves Raspberry Pi 5 Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Raspberry Pi OS Is Now Powered by Linux 6.6 LTS, Improves Raspberry Pi 5 Support
